review: (Translated by Google) Incidentally we ordered 3 twin bed rooms all right here. Too bad I haven't had a chance to take a photo of the room... Friendly service, and the rooms are ok for the price of the people, although parking the car is difficult and you have to be far from the inn but it is safe and understandable at least for very limited land. Just a suggestion, it is necessary to control the cleanliness of the bathroom more and it is necessary to add another socket for charging 2 gadgets or more... (Original) Kebetulan kami pesan 3 kamar twin bed semua pas kesini. Sayang sekali belum sempat foto kamarnya... Pelayanan ramah, dan kamar ok lah untuk harga merakyat, meskipun parkir mobil susah dan harus jauh dari penginapan tapi aman dan bisa dimaklumi setidaknya untuk lahan yang sangat terbatas. Sekedar saran, Perlu untuk lebih mengontrol kebersihan kamar mandinya lagi aja sama perlu tambah stop kontak lagi untuk charging 2 Gadget/lebih...

Dkt bgt sama pusat kota. Cukup jln kaki utk ke area simpanglima. Dkt jg dgn berbagai macam kuliner. Indomaret alfamart jg dkt. Cm minus di tempat parkir nya aj yg cm muat 2 mobil. (Translated by Google) With a very cheap price, the rooms are quite nice and comfortable, the bathroom is also clean, the hot water also works. Already got standard soap and toothbrush The room also smells good. It's just that it doesn't provide non-cash payment instruments. The place is slightly into the alley and the parking lot is as is, usually it will be put in front of the local residents' houses. If you are looking for a place that is just staying the night, this is enough in my opinion. Hanya saja belum menyediakan alat pembayaran non tunai. Tempatnya agak masuk ke gang dan tempat parkirnya se-adanya, biasanya akan di taruh di depan rumah warga sekitar. Kalau cari tempat yang sekedar bermalam saja ini sudah cukup menurut saya.
